int main (void)

Function Documentation

int main ( void   ) 

In the main the actual program is run.
We start from the unity density matrix normed on the particle number and minimize the ojective function:

Tr (Gamma H) - t * ln(det P(Gamma))

Once the minimum is found the parameter t is reduced and a new search is initiated, this goes on until convergence is reached.
The potential is minimized using the Newton-Raphson method and the resulting linear system is solved via the linear conjugate gradient method.
